meanings.definition: A band worn around the head to absorb sweat during physical activity.
meanings.sent1: During the game, the basketball player wore a sweatband to keep sweat out of their eyes.
meanings.sent2: She always wears a sweatband when she goes jogging to prevent sweat from dripping down her face.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked that he needed a sweatband just from watching his friend exercise.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like a sweatband, absorbing all the challenges that came her way.
meanings.sent5: The bright red sweatband stood out against his dark hair, a beacon of his hard work.

meanings.definition: A band of fabric worn around the wrist to absorb sweat during physical activity.
meanings.sent1: The tennis player wore a sweatband on his wrist to keep his hands dry during the match.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new sweatband to match her workout outfit, ensuring she stayed dry and stylish.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the sweatband was a toy and batted at it playfully.
meanings.sent4: His sweatband was like a loyal companion, always there to soak up his hard work.
meanings.sent5: The sweatband was a lifesaver during the intense workout, keeping the sweat from stinging his eyes.
